contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 30, 2012 D SCABA Autumn Contest (First Section)
SCABA Autumn Contest (First Section) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SCABA Autumn Contest scaba-autumn-contest-first-section
The Hawth, Crawley, West Sussex Best Instrumentalist: Chris Line, Soprano (Horsham Borough) Best Euphonium: Maurice Bowers (Northfleet Brass) Best Bass Section: Horsham Borough Highest placed Member Band: Horsham Borough Best Conductor: Melvin White, Northfleet
N.B. The exact match of draw numbers and placings is not a mistake!
Oct. 10, 2011, 7:38 p.m. Oct. 1, 2012, 3:25 p.m.
1 Northfleet Brass Melvin White Renaissance
2 Horsham Borough Andrew Kershaw Symphony of Thanksgiving
3 Fairlop Brass Kevin Jordan
4 BAE Systems Keith Woodger Celebration [Ball]
5 Battle Town Jon Penton The Force of Destiny (La Forza del Destino) - Overture [arr. F. Wright]
